title: Chakra Secrets
description: Becca Chopra, best-selling author of The Chakra Diaries, takes you on a wild ride as she journeys from aspiring actress to respected yoga teacher and chakra healer in Chakra Secrets: On the Path to Love and Happiness.Through the betrayals and brutal loss of her husband, the illness of her best friend, and beyond grief and guilt, she explores yoga, meditation, kundalini, tantric sex, macrobiotics, and even past-lives.She not only shares her personal secrets, but the extraordinary "instant healing" technique she learns in Hawaii from shaman and Huna philosopher, Serge Kahili King, Ph.D.
author: Becca Chopra
